import React from 'react' import useInput from '../../../customHooks/useInput' import { emailValidator } from "../../../UtilityFunctions/inputValidationFunctions" const OrderForm = (props) => { const formIsValid = false const { value: enteredNameValue, hasError: nameInputError, valueChangedHandler: nameChangeHandler, InputBlurHandler: nameInputBlurHandler, isValid: valueIsValid, reset: resetInput } = useInput(emailValidator) const { value: enteredEmailValue, hasError: emailInputError, valueChangedHandler: emailChangeHandler, InputBlurHandler: emailInputBlurHandler, isValid: emailIsValid, reset: resetEmail } = useInput(nameInputValidator) return (

) } export default OrderForm
